displayName.text: Christmas Lights R Us Of Manhattan

formattedAddress: 505 Columbus Ave #793, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 505 Columbus Ave #793, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: The Cool white C9 LED Christmas lights we just had installed are lovely, and my 3-year-old daughter is so captivated by them. The estimator from the company, Kevin, helped a great deal in arranging a suitable schedule for installation and the installers performed exceptionally, and I’m so glad my daughter isn’t trying to eat the lights. I guess they’re too beautiful for her to think of that.

text.text: The Cool white C9 LED Christmas lights we just had installed are lovely, and my 3-year-old daughter is so captivated by them. The estimator from the company, Kevin, helped a great deal in arranging a suitable schedule for installation and the installers performed exceptionally, and I’m so glad my daughter isn’t trying to eat the lights. I guess they’re too beautiful for her to think of that.

originalText.text: The installed multicolor c9 led Christmas lights is a HUGE achievement for my family and I. If you dread the self-installation process just like I do, contacting this team of great minds to install a jaw-dropping, reasonably charged Christmas décor would be an opportunity one would never want to miss. As a well-pleased customer, I will suggest you hire them.

text.text: The installed multicolor c9 led Christmas lights is a HUGE achievement for my family and I. As a well-pleased customer, I will suggest you hire them.

originalText.text: Now that the tough part is Gone, I can relax and take in the view of my beautiful cool white and green Christmas lights. Thanks to the estimator, Kevin, I did not have trouble choosing the color or fixing and installation appointment. I must commend him and the installation crew. They really did a good job.

text.text: Now that the tough part is Gone, I can relax and take in the view of my beautiful cool white and green Christmas lights. Thanks to the estimator, Kevin, I did not have trouble choosing the color or fixing and installation appointment. I must commend him and the installation crew. They really did a good job.

originalText.text: We used this company to install our led Christmas lights and cannot say enough great things about this company and its workers. Brett gave us a fair price which is much lower than others in my area and they didn’t compromise on quality. The install crew was punctual and professional. I recommend them and we’ll use them next year.

text.text: We used this company to install our led Christmas lights and cannot say enough great things about this company and its workers. Brett gave us a fair price which is much lower than others in my area and they didn’t compromise on quality. The install crew was punctual and professional. I recommend them and we’ll use them next year.

originalText.text: I thought installing holiday lights was a simple task to accomplish, just trying to take measurements, and a little bit of going up and down was just enough to make me reconsider. After relaxing for some minutes, we decided to reach out to this company and had them send Kevin over for estimation. He drew up a fair estimate, and we agreed to it. Two days later, a team of installers came along with our requested warm white and blue C9 LED Christmas lights. They were very meticulous and perfectly installed just as my wife wanted it. They were greatly careful with all the details of our decoration. Hiring them was the right call!
